price: いや、アッラー*があなた方の庇護者*なのであり、かれが最善の援助者なのだ。
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
